com.uk.aisl.guidewire.shredder.model

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.uk.aisl.guidewire.shredder.model.SuperDatabase
      • com.uk.aisl.guidewire.shredder.model.Database

  • public class Database
extends SuperDatabase
    The master mapping.xml wrapper. It contains all the values, look ups etc.
    Author:
    Karl Parry

    • Constructor Detail

      • Database

        public Database()
        Constructor that inistialises the LookUps to a maximum of 45 look ups. More is supported but may be slower.

      • createStatements

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> createStatements()
        Creates the insert statements dynamically based on the structure and order outlined in mapping.xml.

        This will correctly map the values to the column/table name and their corresponding values
        Returns:
        A list of string insert statements
